command: find /boot -type f -exec sha256sum {} \; | sort -k2 > /var/tmp/boot_manifest.sha256 && diff -u /var/backups/boot_manifest.sha256 /var/tmp/boot_manifest.sha256 || true
explanation: Generates a per-file checksum manifest of the boot partition and diffs it against a baseline to spot image-related tampering.
rationale_steps: Hash all boot-critical files to capture current state.
Compare against a stored baseline to detect unexpected changes in the system image and related components.
